summary: This bill, H.R. 2022, addresses the reliquidation of certain entries of golf cart tires (K389 Hole-N-One) imported by specific companies. It references rulings by U.S. Customs and Border Protection and seeks to authorize the agency to reliquidate these entries, refunding previously paid duties with interest, regardless of limitations in the Tariff Act of 1930. The bill specifies affected entries by importer, entry number, entry date, and port of entry, with a deadline for reliquidation within 90 days of enactment.
